Name: Le Restaurant
Review Text: This is a small restaurant with wonderful food and wine, and personal warm service. I have had the pleasure of dining here twice. Both times exceptional. They remembered me the second time. The second occasion was a business dinner and my global guests were duly impressed and we had a fantastic and relaxed evening. I will be back!

Name: Le Restaurant
Review Text: Food and wine of outstanding quality and a very warm and comfortable atmosphere! The staff was very polite and thoughtful - overall an unforgettable experience in Amsterdam!

Name: Le Restaurant
Review Text: Man, oh man, I loved coming here to try the food. It was delicious and with a big menu from which I couldn't decide what to eat. The atmosphere is very nice and comfortable and the service is great. Loved the wine.

Name: Le Restaurant
Review Text: Good place if you wanna try French cuisine. Pleasant atmosphere, fabulous food, great wine collection. Service is a bit slow but very polite and welcoming. Be ready to spend a mint of money there. Pay attention that it's closed at Sundays and Mondays.

Name: Le Restaurant
Review Text: Beautiful little restaurant with a great atmosphere. Good, fun and personal service, also from the chef. Easily one of the best restaurants in Amsterdam. Go!    (Only 8 or 9 tables so make a reservation)
